iCON FOR DARK/LIGHTMODE

<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" data-bs-toggle="button">Toggle button</button>

<html lang="en" data-bs-theme="dark">
                  <button type="button" class="btn-menu">Dashboard</button>
                  <li><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="40" height="40" fill="currentColor" class="bi bi-sun" viewBox="0 0 16 16">
                    <path d="M8 11a3 3 0 1 1 0-6 3 3 0 0 1 0 6zm0 1a4 4 0 1 0 0-8 4 4 0 0 0 0 8zM8 0a.5.5 0 0 1 .5.5v2a.5.5 0 0 1-1 0v-2A.5.5 0 0 1 8 0zm0 13a.5.5 0 0 1 .5.5v2a.5.5 0 0 1-1 0v-2A.5.5 0 0 1 8 13zm8-5a.5.5 0 0 1-.5.5h-2a.5.5 0 0 1 0-1h2a.5.5 0 0 1 .5.5zM3 8a.5.5 0 0 1-.5.5h-2a.5.5 0 0 1 0-1h2A.5.5 0 0 1 3 8zm10.657-5.657a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .707l-1.414 1.415a.5.5 0 1 1-.707-.708l1.414-1.414a.5.5 0 0 1 .707 0zm-9.193 9.193a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .707L3.05 13.657a.5.5 0 0 1-.707-.707l1.414-1.414a.5.5 0 0 1 .707 0zm9.193 2.121a.5.5 0 0 1-.707 0l-1.414-1.414a.5.5 0 0 1 .707-.707l1.414 1.414a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .707zM4.464 4.465a.5.5 0 0 1-.707 0L2.343 3.05a.5.5 0 1 1 .707-.707l1.414 1.414a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708z"/>
                  </svg></li>


Button for DASHBOARD EMBEB CONTENT FROM OTHER PAGE 

css
.offcanvas, .offcanvas-lg, .offcanvas-md, .offcanvas-sm, .offcanvas-xl, .offcanvas-xxl {
  --bs-offcanvas-zindex: 1045;
  --bs-offcanvas-width: 400px;
  --bs-offcanvas-height: 100vh;
  --bs-offcanvas-padding-x: 1rem;
  --bs-offcanvas-padding-y: 1rem;
  --bs-offcanvas-color: var(--bs-body-color);
  --bs-offcanvas-bg: var(--bs-body-bg);
  --bs-offcanvas-border-width: var(--bs-border-width);
  --bs-offcanvas-border-color: var(--bs-border-color-translucent);
  --bs-offcanvas-box-shadow: 0 0.125rem 0.25rem rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.075);
  --bs-offcanvas-transition: transform 0.3s ease-in-out;
  --bs-offcanvas-title-line-height: 1.5;
}

iframe {
  border: 0;
  height: 100%;
}

html

<button class="btn btn-primary" type="button" data-bs-toggle="offcanvas" data-bs-target="#offcanvasTop" aria-controls="offcanvasTop">Test for dashboard buttons</button>

  </div>
  <div class="offcanvas-body">
